TopicTitle: [1.0] Vietnam War Series F-4 And Mig-21 (United Aces of Jeb)

Articles.Content:
![shqLY4e.png](http://i.imgur.com/shqLY4e.png)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps (sort of) comes the F-4 Phantom and the Mig-21 Fishbed. The planes most people imagine in a dogfight over the Vietnamese jungle when they think of the Vietnamese war.

![wk6K55h.png](http://i.imgur.com/wk6K55h.png)

McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom Specs:

Top Speed: 320 M/S

Fuel: 1920

Weight: 21.4 Tons

Parts: 48

Price: $41,099

![6pBcvkP.png](http://i.imgur.com/6pBcvkP.png)

Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-21 Fishbed Specs:

Top Speed: 400 M/S

Fuel: 600

Weight: 7.8 Tons

Parts: 20

Price: $16,200

![2OYw3fG.png](http://i.imgur.com/2OYw3fG.png)

McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/qilz37uj1dza1zf/F-4%20Phantom.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qilz37uj1dza1zf/F-4%20Phantom.craft?dl=0)

Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-21 Fishbed Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/9venr3bhb0ur08a/MIG-21%20Fishbed.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9venr3bhb0ur08a/MIG-21%20Fishbed.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T03:21:12Z" title="06/01/2015 03:21  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by Ace\_Of\_Spades**

And, therefore, we can conclude the Trussian comrade MiG 21 is better than the F-4, who needs all that fuel anyway? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> And, therefore, we can conclude the Trussian comrade MiG 21 is better than the F-4, who needs all that fuel anyway? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I was only trying to replicate the design/look of the original craft not size or performance

> 
> I was only trying to replicate the design/look of the original craft not size or performance

In the world of KSP, it is, which is why i said Trussian, instead of Russian, the MiG here could catch up easily to the F-4 there, although neither can shoot at eachother ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> In the world of KSP, it is, which is why i said Trussian, instead of Russian, the MiG here could catch up easily to the F-4 there, although neither can shoot at eachother ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
